Brushing a Duck's Teeth

I’ve always been lousy at introductions, so I’ll get straight to the point.

You see, coffee and I â€“ we sort of have a ‘thing.’ I confess. Well, it’s really more of a lusty infatuation. I figure if we’re going to keep spending this much time together, I should probably learn a thing or two about her. You know, so we have something to talk about above the sheets.

I’ll use this space to collect tasting notes and make snarky comments on the generally snobby coffee community. I won’t, however, get into pedantic discussions over the precise pressure to pull a proper shot of espresso.

But I probably will keep up the alliteration.jsshaper: http://jsshaper.org “an extensible framework for JavaScript syntax tree shaping”

January 18, 2011
